thing.dna.phenotyper

Interface I_gene_pair_evaluator

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    C_GenePairEvaluatorSum

    public interface I_gene_pair_evaluator
    Provides a means for expressing the alleles stored at a certain locus in a diploid (mapped)DNA. The "allele value" isn't necessarily straightforward to compute. Any implementor can provide a means of expressing these alleles, be it summation of the allele pair, averaging, difference, or some nonlinear function. *
    Version:
    1.0, Sun Jan 28 18:22:36 2001
    Author:
    kyle wagner, elyk@acm.org, review JLF 02.2011

      java.lang.Object expressGene(C_Gene gL, C_Gene gR)
      Takes a pair of genes from a diploid chromosome pair and express them.

                           C_Gene gR)
        Takes a pair of genes from a diploid chromosome pair and express them.
        Parameters:
        gL - the left gene in the pair
        gR - the right gene in the pair
